sourceDesc.p: None, this electronic version is the original.

div.p: CW, SB, LB, MD, DB, DD, JF, SR, AB, SS, NS, EV, PW. started 13:05; LR joined 13:08.

LB has (eventually) sent the Sanskrit examples; no response from JS yet (not suprisingly). CW reports he phoned a few days ago and they sought a solution. Plan is for JS to post his problem to the choice list.
LB to find LR's URL for minutes.
P5 -> SF; SB recommends delay for deleted chaps and a few global changes; DD disagrees, suggests just note deleted chapters as bugs.
JF yet to actually post a from the Chair, is holding out for election slate. JF wants a process, will give Board & Council a week's notice heads-up. JF is thinking of posting these quarterly.

note.name: SS & JF
note.resp: post a call for more SIGs — if you want to form a SIG, here's how.

note.name: DD
note.resp: post updated list of issues presented in Ghent to Council

note.name: JF & DD
note.resp: get together and submit MIME proposal

div.p: Discussion of ODD, freeze or improve? SR suggests TD be frozen (bug fixes, of course) as is; SB concurs, but would like it to be explicit that we plan to improve ODD in the future. SR concedes an oversight on META's part (no way to express some things that are expressable in RelaxNG, particularly co-occurence constraints), but suggests (and all agree) that repair should be deferred (time span 6 months used in lieu of a real number).
FS close to final status, most recent changes are not of the TEI part.

note.name: LR
note.resp: investigate if P4 FSD works to describe new FSs.

div.p: MD on MS description. Not much. Still waiting on feedback from task force. MD (DD, SB, MP) finish up MD 2 weeks
JF on PB, little progress since July. LB suggests low-hanging fruit, JF will send to list.

note.name: editors
note.resp: suggestion for how to handle this SF stuff, how to get Council input.

note.name: Councilors
note.resp: read and comment on each SF feature request

note.name: Councilors
note.resp: submit report for MM to CW
